Program Code

Source: R/utils.R
program_code.Rd

Code for primary program related to a data asset, from the Federal Program Inventory.

Usage

program_code(x = NULL)

Source

DCAT Schema: Program Code

Arguments

x

<chr> The program code to search for, e.g., "009:000"; if NULL (the default), returns all program codes

Value

<tibble> of search results

Examples

program_code("009:000")
#> # A tibble: 1 × 6
#>   agencyName programName additionalInfo agencyCode programCode programCodePODfmt
#>   <chr>      <chr>       <chr>          <chr>      <chr>       <chr>            
#> 1 Departmen… (Primary P… NA             009        009-000     009:000          

head(program_code())
#> # A tibble: 6 × 6
#>   agencyName programName additionalInfo agencyCode programCode programCodePODfmt
#>   <chr>      <chr>       <chr>          <chr>      <chr>       <chr>            
#> 1 Departmen… Rural Busi… NA             005        005-001     005:001          
#> 2 Departmen… Rural Busi… NA             005        005-002     005:002          
#> 3 Departmen… Energy Ass… NA             005        005-003     005:003          
#> 4 Departmen… Distance L… NA             005        005-004     005:004          
#> 5 Departmen… Rural Elec… NA             005        005-005     005:005          
#> 6 Departmen… Rural Wate… NA             005        005-006     005:006
